divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside my apartment complex to smoke a cigarette and at the time i heard a really weird noise coming from the distance at the time i was thinking "oh my god i hope its not a UFO i hate ufos" and little be known to me it was...... It Flew allmost directly over me it was a giant BLACK triangle (the size of half a football field possibly) with 3 YELLOW lights and 1 REDDDISH-BLACK Pulsating light in the middle....... my body went into a shock state and i just starred at it in awe and horror at the same time it looked like it was on a set course at a set speed at a set height it was cruising not as slow as a blimp just a little faster but it was really errie and creepy it made a WHERRRRRRing noise really low pitched and deep ( personally i think some are evil ) but that's just me i felt scared i kissed my cross went inside and prayed when this was over i lost site of the object when it went over some trees, i didn't bother to run out to the road to see where it went.... i was too freaked out thinking i could possibly get abducted... below is a picture i found online that is allmost to a T of what i saw
Summary: Saw A Triangle Shapped UFO Fly Overhead
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hales Corners
This sighting has never been favorited.
